review_content: Bought already 4 products: food dryer, knife sharpener, high pressure water cleaner and home trainer. All works like a charm after months of usage! Home trainer is magic, I do sports every day for 1.5-2h and it is still like new after 6 months of hard work

I ordered a TIG (WIG) / MMA welder, model S-WIGMA 200PDC.1. Shipment to Austria was very quick, tracking and delivery by GLS perfect2. The Welding DeviceFirst welding tests with stick electrodes (MMA) were fine, ignition, arc stable.I measured the current with a Fluke clamp on meter and checked the deviation. At 100 and 110 Ampere the measured current was almost exactly the adjusted one.At lower current like 50 and 55 Ampere the measured current was slightly lower (~ 3 Amps).I think that's pretty good for such a nonprofessional device.No tests with TIG (WIG) welding so far, but planned for near future...3. Customer supportI had a few questions - prompt response, polite.But one thing I have to mention:An answer to a specific question was not correct:They said the plug has a 13 mm socket. After I received the device, I measured and it turned out it is a 9mm socket.Summary: a nice welder with advanced features and adjustments like pulse frequency, Hot start, Arc Force, etc. for a reasonable price.

review_title: The order has arrived as promised
review_content: The order has arrived as promised. All was great, I was just surprised that the order will be dispatched from other country - as the website was in Bulgarian, I thought that the product is in local stock, so the delivery time was kind of disappointing - I ordered the product as a gift to a friend of mine, and it arrived after the date.

I bought I dump wagon. It has failed after 11 months and Expondo isn‚Äôt honouring the warranty. Even though wagon has a 2 year warranty.Part of stirring bracket has split do to bad design and thin metal of the wagon.

review_title: do not buy from this company at any cost, because you will be very sorry.
review_content: i bought a space heater from this company, it was delivered by UPS couriers, and it wouldn't work properly, so they sent me a return document to be brought back to them by GLS couriers and they said they repaired it and sent it back with GLS couriers, and they threw it over the gate onto the road and busted the back of the heater, i plugged it in and it was worse than when it came, i got back onto them and all they could offer me was a credit note if i returned it, i paid the UPS courier when he delivered it, i didn't give him a credit note, i contacted GLS couriers and we can only deal with expondo, get back onto them, and i did, only to get the same crap.So who the hell is going to pay for the damaged property. looks like nobody.So i say, do not buy from this company at any cost, because you will be very sorry.
Super fast shopping, I found my product quickly, no problems. all information I needed about technical parameters was available, so no need to get in touch with virtual assistant. I like this store.
Good and fast delivery of this amazing standing desk system, it was quite fast at very good price.

Purchase proces 'mothers milk' pleasant and easy at the same time.I bought the greenhouse.Product in general is OK.We set it on the concrete foundation so it stand very solid. Great thinks are the gutters on both side so water is kept away.One concern are quite fast rusting screws and not fully closed roof windowall in all product looks promising :)Service of Expondo is fast and reliable, after rising concern about some spare parts we get it with no problem

review_title: I bought a product from Expondo

review_title: Great quality product and in great‚Ä¶
review_content: Great quality product and in great condition. No issue with expondo although bear in mind 1-3 days delivery may apply to some items but mine came from Poland and I don't recall seeing it could take around 2 weeks which I see as acceptable but I was expecting far sooner so just bare that in mind. May also have been due to stuff like a certain country trying to take over a bordering country which may also cause delays. #furussia

Thanks to resourceful customer service, my RCMB-2LA blender is working properly again.Elena from expondo GmbH has become my favorite person from the company. She solved my problem quickly and efficiently. It turns out that keeping a customer after warranty is as important as getting a new one. We are staying for a long time with products from exppondo.

I haven't had time to deal with the power supply yet due to other work. I did some tests and the voltage on this power supply seems pretty accurate, the current limit does its job. Parallel and serial mode work fine. This equipment has USB, serial and RJ45 connectors. The included CD contains drivers and programming software.The price of the device was very friendly. Shipping was very fast.So I like this device. I am satisfied with the purchase.

Quick checkout. Bought air purifier 10050053 works proper - used to desinfect the interior of some cars because the cabin air filter change didn't help much. After the deodorisation (~30 min.) the unpleasant smell shortly after after turning on the AC is finally gone! Only drawback is the full user manual non included in the package but downloadable form the shop manual QR-code or link...but I'm an old school guy who prefers the printed ones.A product worth recommendation after all!

In many situations of everyday life you need tools that are only used occasionally and that are not exposed to extreme continuous stress. in these cases, expensive branded products are a pointless waste of money. expondo. com precisely fulfills its purpose  in this area: good quality, low prices. the processing from order to delivery runs perfectly.

The equipment was fairly priced compared to similar. The advert said 3 day‚Äôs delivery but it took 7 so planning the job was affected, however the saving & the equipment made me happy with the deal. 33% less than competitors. Excellent value.

Ordered some stainless steelposts and straps for a new art gallery. Top notch quality product , superbly packed, swiftly delivered. I thought great value for the product quality. Could do with a little more communication - delivery turned up and it was only by chance that I was there. But bar that tiny criticism (easy to address) very good company to deal with.

I purchased an oven which arrived with the glass smashed. Expondo said that they would take back and replace with a new one. I took a day off work to wait for the pickup. No-one came. When I complained I got a series of extremely passive aggressive and unprofessional responses, i.e., the driver was at your apartment, here is a screenshot as proof, we will charge you for a second attempt .... with the screenshot being of a completely different address. Ultimately the company refused to give a time to pick up the item they delivered broken, and has ignored my repeated requests for a refund.

review_title: Pot ordered, returned and still no refund 7 weeks later
review_content: I paid for this product on the 9th of August. The pot was delivered to me on the 22nd of August and I effected a return on the same day. This was due to the website indicating that the product would have been delivered between 1-3 days. I received it over 2 weeks later. I didn't need the pot by then, as I had needed it for the 11th of August.I queried my refund several times since then to receive feedback stating "we will continue to monitor this return and can refund you as soon as I get confirmation from our UK return centre. Rest assured, we are checking daily for the status of the parcel" - seriously? I am extremely disappointed as it is now over 7 weeks later, and I have still not received a refund. I have contacted them again yesterday and I still have not had a response.This is unacceptable. Their customer service is shocking.

We have returned the product to them on 12 October and they are not refunding the money, this confirms that these people are scammers. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS WEBSITE.I bought Iduction Cooker for ¬£179 (INV500141188).Item delivered is faulty and I'm unable to contact the seller, there are no telephone or email address provided in the invoice or website.This company is a scam. I will now contact my bank to get my money returned to me.

review_title: be careful when buying thing from Expondo, do not be stupid
review_content: I live in Helsinki - Finland, and bought a multicooker from Expondo because their advertising is so good. The machine arrived later than I thought, and it arrived when I was not home ( away for a month for private mater), and when I was back, check on the machine, it was not working properly (some buttons of the machine don't work). I contacted customer service and their answer was:  send the machine to them, and they will have a free fix for me ( yes, they have to fix it because they sent me the machine which cannot use). I sent it to their address, and it took 21 days to arrive at their address. Expondo will take some time to fix and send back to me later (approximately another 21 days to ship and some more days to fix).Conclusion: after more than 3 months of paying full money, I don't have the machine to use, and I don't know how long Expondo will take to fix the machine. The way customer service responds like I have to take it because that's the way it is. I feel so stupid to buy things from Expondo.If I would go to the electrical shop nearby ( for example Giganti), I would have a proper machine to use, and in case of the machine doesn't work properly, Giganti always changes the new one immediately.Do not buy anything from Expondo if you are not stupid.
I can only give Expondo our fullest recommendations. Very well priced, products as you'd expect and super fast shipping to Denmark. We will be back for more!

review_title: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE IN THE UK
review_content: TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE IN THE UK. I purchased a dehydrator which stopped working for some unknown reason (not a problem this happens). The machine was in warranty. They bounced me around for nearly a month and then started to ask what the fault of the machine is again. I responded to their returns team saying you already know the fault please just come and collect it and they were very rude and passive aggressive towards me. Having a joke and a laugh at my expense. I would assume that they do not stick by the terms of their warranty as I still have not had my machine picked up and my only communication from Expondu is someone being really rude to me ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. Extremely bad service. I purchase a lot of equipment for my restaurant and will not be doing it from Expodu again after this. Can only suggest to avoid if you like dealing with professionals- these guys are terrible.

Used expondo.ie for the first time to purchase a digital weighing scales.For a refurbshed product it still looked like new and was very high quality.A true test of a company is when things go wrong. In this case there were mounting clips missing from the package. Customer service remedied this matter immediately and sent out replacements.  Then through no fault of expondo, the package was delivered to the wrong building.  Customer service were again very good. They promptly provided proof of delivery which helped me track down the missing package.  Very happy with the product and after sales customer service
Parfait, rapide et de qualit√©

Outstanding experience so far. I‚Äôm not sure why this company has gotten so many negative reviews, I have found them to be fantastic. After buying a hot tub off them 12 months ago, there was a slight tear in it. I contacted their support, they replied the same day and told me they have a lifetime warranty for it and I could send it away to be repaired. They sent someone to pick it up from my house and all, all that had to be done was box it up. After this, they discovered the hole could not be repaired and offered a brand new hot tub which we accepted. I now have tracking details for the new hot tub which is in transit on its way to us. I will update this review when I have received the replacement. Their customer service has been impeccable, very quick and extremely helpful. I have mainly dealt with chrissie woods. I was also impressed with how willing they were to fulfil their side of the agreement for the warranty. UPDATE: got the new replacement hot tub and it was perfect!!
